channel.title: Alcon Entertainment on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Alcon Entertainment on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery Nears Win in ‘Blade Runner 2049’ Legal Battle Over Tesla’s AI Images
item.description: Part of Alcon’s motivations for continuing to pursue the lawsuit relates to an upcoming TV series based on the movie. The company expressed that it wants to distance itself from Tesla and Elon Musk.
